snippet: Some analysts believe the Russian leader’s strong response to criticism from Western leaders may be a way to deflect attention from simmering domestic problems....
abstract: Some analysts say Pres Vladimir Putin's extreme reaction to suggestion from United States that Russia should be investigated for war crimes has motives beyond Syria and Russia's position on world stage; commentators say threats and swagger serve to distract from budget holes and cuts at home.

byline.contributor: Ivan Nechepurenko and Oleg Matsnev contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Some analysts believe the Russian leader’s strong response to criticism from Western leaders may be a way to deflect attention from simmering domestic problems.

headline.main: Behind Putin’s Combativeness, Some See Motives Other Than Syria
headline.print_headline: Behind Putin’s Combativeness, Some See Motives Other Than Syria
